languages.text: {n}Замершая толпа переглядывается с облегчением. Ваше молчание они явно истолковали как добрый знак. Его — и то, что вы никого из них пока не прикончили.{/n}

{n}The gladiators, who were holding their breath, look at each other with relief. They must have taken your silence as a good sign. Or rather, your silence and the fact that you have not killed any of them yet.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Замершая толпа переглядывается с облегчением. Ваше молчание они явно истолковали как добрый знак. Его — и то, что вы никого из них пока не прикончили.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The gladiators, who were holding their breath, look at each other with relief. They must have taken your silence as a good sign. Or rather, both the silence and the fact that you have not killed any of them yet.{/n}
traits.speaker: RoaringMale_Gladiator

traits.speaker: RoaringMale_Gladiator

languages.text: {n}息を飲んでいた剣闘士たちは互いを見つめ合い、安堵の表情を浮かべる。彼らはあなたの沈黙を良いサインと受け取ったに違いない。というより、沈黙そして、あなたがまだ誰も殺していないという事実の両方だ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The gladiators, who were holding their breath, look at each other with relief. They must have taken your silence as a good sign. Or rather, your silence and the fact that you have not killed any of them yet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}息を飲んでいた剣闘士たちは互いを見つめ合い、安堵の表情を浮かべる。彼らはあなたの沈黙を良いサインと受け取ったに違いない。というより、沈黙そして、あなたがまだ誰も殺していないという事実の両方だ。{/n}
traits.speaker: RoaringMale_Gladiator

languages.text: {n}所有屏住呼吸的角斗士都松了口气，互相交换着眼色。在他们眼里，你的沉默看起来是个好兆头。更确切地说，你还并没有杀死他们其中任何人，这确实是个好兆头。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The gladiators, who were holding their breath, look at each other with relief. They must have taken your silence as a good sign. Or rather, your silence and the fact that you have not killed any of them yet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}所有屏住呼吸的角斗士都松了口气，互相交换着眼色。在他们眼里，你的沉默看起来是个好兆头。更确切地说，你还并没有杀死他们其中任何人，这确实是个好兆头。{/n}
traits.speaker: RoaringMale_Gladiator

languages.text: {n}Los gladiadores, que estaban conteniendo la respiración, se miran aliviados. Deben haber tomado tu silencio como una buena señal. Bueno, tanto el silencio como el hecho de que aún no hayas matado a ninguno de ellos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The gladiators, who were holding their breath, look at each other with relief. They must have taken your silence as a good sign. Or rather, your silence and the fact that you have not killed any of them yet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los gladiadores, que estaban conteniendo la respiración, se miran aliviados. Deben haber tomado tu silencio como una buena señal. Bueno, tanto el silencio como el hecho de que aún no hayas matado a ninguno de ellos.{/n}
traits.speaker: RoaringMale_Gladiator

languages.text: {n}Die Gladiatoren, die die ganze Zeit über den Atem angehalten hatten, blicken einander erleichtert an. Sie haben dein Schweigen wohl als gutes Zeichen gewartet. Oder wohl eher dein Schweigen und die Tatsache, dass du noch keinen von ihnen getötet hast.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The gladiators, who were holding their breath, look at each other with relief. They must have taken your silence as a good sign. Or rather, your silence and the fact that you have not killed any of them yet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Gladiatoren, die die ganze Zeit über den Atem angehalten hatten, blicken einander erleichtert an. Sie haben dein Schweigen wohl als gutes Zeichen gewartet. Oder besser gesagt sowohl das Schweigen als auch die Tatsache, dass du noch keinen von ihnen getötet hast.{/n}
traits.speaker: RoaringMale_Gladiator

languages.text: {n}Les gladiateurs, qui avaient jusque-là retenu leur respiration, laissent échapper un long soupir de soulagement tout en se regardant les uns les autres, visiblement rassurés par votre silence. Ou plutôt, par votre silence et le fait que vous ne les ayez pas encore tués.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The gladiators, who were holding their breath, look at each other with relief. They must have taken your silence as a good sign. Or rather, your silence and the fact that you have not killed any of them yet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les gladiateurs, qui avaient jusque-là retenu leur respiration, laissent échapper un long soupir de soulagement tout en se regardant les uns les autres, visiblement rassurés par votre silence. Ou plutôt, par votre silence et le fait que vous ne les ayez pas encore tués.{/n}
traits.speaker: RoaringMale_Gladiator

languages.text: {n}Merakla bekleyen gladyatörler, iç rahatlığıyla göz göze geliyor. Sessiz kalışını iyiye işaret olarak yorumlamış olmalılar. Daha doğrusu, hem sessiz kalmış hem de henüz hiçbirini öldürmemiş olmanı.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The gladiators, who were holding their breath, look at each other with relief. They must have taken your silence as a good sign. Or rather, your silence and the fact that you have not killed any of them yet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Merakla bekleyen gladyatörler, iç rahatlığıyla göz göze geliyor. Sessiz kalışını iyiye işaret olarak yorumlamış olmalılar. Daha doğrusu, hem sessiz kalmış hem de henüz hiçbirini öldürmemiş olmanı.{/n}
traits.speaker: RoaringMale_Gladiator
